projects.title: Spectrum
projects.shortDescription: Action roguelike with deep customization and elemental combos being developed at a small indie studio at Harvard.

projects.title: Sink or Swim
projects.shortDescription: .io-like game where you and a friend control a pirate ship and fight other online players on a massive ocean map.

projects.title: Fractal Factory
projects.shortDescription: Puzzle game where you use a visual scripting language to recreate fractals with the goal of helping students visually understand recursion.

projects.title: Shield Buster
projects.shortDescription: Created a game and a game controller with detachable magnetic components. In the game, you fight a boss and survive by using the detachable components, which are shields that each have different abilities.

projects.title: Harshian Swamp
projects.shortDescription: 2D rhythm platformer inspired by Pac-Man that placed in the top ten in high school FBLA national competition.

projects.title: Battlefish
projects.shortDescription: Co-located mixed reality game where players compete to catch fish using spears, nets, and cannons. Won the Game Prototyping track at MIT Reality Hack.

projects.title: Lightweaver
projects.shortDescription: Mixed reality sword fighting game using Meta's XR toolkit and with my own 3D models and AI video motion-captured animations

projects.title: Sound Factory
projects.shortDescription: Virtual reality sound and music creation sandbox that goes along with a haptic glove we created.

projects.title: ARtMuse
projects.shortDescription: An interactive WebGL learning experience at the Harvard Art Museums.
